name: CandorIQ
headline: Headcount & Compensation Management
description:
CandorIQ is software to manage Headcount and Compensation planning. Employees are +70% of all OPEX and yet still managed in sheets & email. We manage all people spend in 1 platform, integrated into your Finance & HR stack.

Product capabilities include:
- Headcount & backfill planning
- Headcount budget scenarios across departments
- Merit cycle planning
- Analytics including employee churn, hiring win/loss, cash burn

founders.name: Haris Ikram, Founder
founders.description:
Founder & CEO at CandorIQ. Former Head of Product at Checkr (YC) & Salesforce.
MBA at University of Chicago, BSc of Computer Engineering at KFUPM.

founders.name: Sutthipong Thavisomboon, Founder
founders.description: Founder & CTO at CandorIQ. Former Chief Architect at Series B Startup & Principal Engineer at Salesforce Einstein (Lead AI). MS Computer Science at Stanford University.

generated_description:
**CandorIQ: Simplifying Headcount and Compensation Management**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator Batch S23, CandorIQ is on a mission to transform how companies manage their most significant operational expense: their people. With over 70% of operational expenditures tied to employee costs, it’s surprising that many organizations still rely on spreadsheet chaos and email threads for headcount and compensation planning. Enter CandorIQ—a comprehensive platform that centralizes all people-related expenses, integrating seamlessly into your Finance and HR systems.

### Product Offerings

CandorIQ’s capabilities include:

- **Headcount & Backfill Planning**: Streamlining the hiring process and tracking staffing needs.
- **Budget Scenarios**: Creating various headcount budget scenarios to navigate across departments.
- **Merit Cycle Planning**: Facilitating merit increases and compensation cycles efficiently.
- **Analytics Tools**: Analyzing employee churn, hiring win/loss rates, and cash burn to gain actionable insights.

### The Platform In Action

Imagine having all your people spend managed in one cohesive platform, enabling leaders to make data-driven decisions that align with their organizational goals. With tools such as real-time analytics, collaboration features, and automation for tasks like merit letter generation and candidate offers, CandorIQ empowers HR and finance teams to work together more effectively. 

### Who’s Behind CandorIQ?

Despite its recent inception, CandorIQ boasts a lean and efficient team of four, including notable Group Partner Nicolas Dessaigne. The startup is based in an undisclosed location, yet its ambitions are clear: to redefine how businesses approach headcount and compensation management.

### Why Choose CandorIQ?

Let’s face it: dealing with compensation is increasingly complex, especially with new pay transparency laws emerging. CandorIQ simplifies this by offering a transparent, customizable portal for navigating employee total rewards, ensuring that adjustments are fair and consistent.

Find out more about their solutions and explore insights into managing people spend on [CandorIQ's website](https://www.candoriq.com).

### Conclusion

In a business landscape where attracting and retaining top talent is paramount, CandorIQ provides the tools and insight businesses need to manage their workforce effectively. Moving beyond outdated practices, it helps organizations invest wisely in their biggest asset: their people.
